experiences.title: Ski Adventure in Åre
experiences.shortDescription: A 3–7 day ski trip to Åre with slopes for all levels, cozy cabins and great food.
experiences.longDescription: Experience Sweden's top ski destination with perfectly groomed slopes, cozy restaurants and a true mountain village atmosphere. This trip is ideal for families, couples or groups of friends who want a mix of skiing, relaxation and good food.

packages.name: Ski & Boots Rental
packages.description: Rent skis, boots and poles for your entire stay.

packages.name: Lift Pass Package
packages.description: Full-day lift pass for all days of your trip.

packages.name: Après-ski Dinner
packages.description: Three-course dinner at a popular mountain restaurant.

experiences.title: Family Ski Week in Trysil
experiences.shortDescription: A family-friendly ski week in Trysil with kids' areas and ski school options.
experiences.longDescription: Perfect for families who want safe and fun skiing. Trysil offers wide slopes, kids' areas, ski school and comfortable accommodation close to the lifts.

packages.name: Ski School for Kids
packages.description: 2-hour group ski school per day for children.

packages.name: Evening Sledding
packages.description: Guided sledding evening with hot chocolate included.

experiences.title: City Escape to Tokyo
experiences.shortDescription: Explore Tokyo's neon lights, sushi bars and calm temples in one packed trip.
experiences.longDescription: Dive into one of the world's most exciting cities. This trip combines modern skyscrapers, traditional temples, amazing food and unique shopping. Great for couples and friends who want an urban adventure.

packages.name: Guided Sushi Tour
packages.description: Visit local sushi spots with an English-speaking guide.

packages.name: Day Trip to Mt. Fuji
packages.description: Bus trip including lake cruise and mountain viewpoints.

experiences.title: Relaxing Beach Retreat in Maldives
experiences.shortDescription: Crystal clear water, white beaches and total relaxation in an island paradise.
experiences.longDescription: Stay in a beach villa or overwater bungalow, enjoy warm water, snorkeling and sunsets. Ideal for honeymoons, anniversaries or anyone who needs a real break.

packages.name: Guided Snorkeling Tour
packages.description: Boat trip to nearby reefs with guide and equipment.

experiences.title: Safari Adventure in Kenya
experiences.shortDescription: See wild animals up close on a classic African safari.
experiences.longDescription: Go on morning and evening game drives with experienced guides, stay in comfortable safari lodges and enjoy the African savannah. Perfect for nature lovers and photographers.

packages.name: Hot Air Balloon Safari
packages.description: Sunrise balloon ride over the savannah including breakfast.

packages.name: Photography Workshop
packages.description: Small group photography workshop with a professional guide.

experiences.title: Weekend City Break in Rome
experiences.shortDescription: History, pasta and gelato – discover Rome in a long weekend.
experiences.longDescription: Walk among ancient ruins, visit famous landmarks and enjoy Italian food. Great for couples, friends or solo travelers looking for a short but intense getaway.

packages.name: Vatican Museums Ticket
packages.description: Skip-the-line ticket to the Vatican Museums and Sistine Chapel.

packages.name: Food & Wine Tour
packages.description: Evening tour with tastings of local dishes and wines.

experiences.title: Northern Lights Experience in Abisko
experiences.shortDescription: Chase the northern lights above the Arctic Circle.
experiences.longDescription: Travel to Swedish Lapland and experience snow, silence and the magical northern lights. Includes guided aurora tour and free time for winter activities.

packages.name: Dogsled Tour
packages.description: Half-day dogsled trip through Lapland landscapes.

packages.name: Aurora Photography Session
packages.description: Evening with photo guide and camera tripod included.

articles.title: Why Nordic Ski Resorts Are Perfect for Winter Getaways
articles.excerpt: Thinking about a ski trip this winter? Here’s why the Nordic mountains are a great choice for all ages.
articles.body: Nordic ski destinations like Åre and Trysil combine modern lifts, cozy villages and family-friendly slopes. Compared to the Alps, travel times are often shorter and the atmosphere more relaxed. Whether you are traveling with kids, friends or as a couple, you will find slopes that match your level...

articles.title: How to Choose the Right Type of Trip
articles.excerpt: Safari, city break, ski week or beach? We help you match your next trip with your travel style.
articles.body: Before you book, ask yourself what you really want from your holiday: relaxation, adventure, culture or family time. A beach trip to the Maldives gives you maximum relaxation, while a safari in Kenya offers unforgettable encounters with wildlife. City breaks like Rome or Tokyo fit those who love food, history and urban energy...

articles.title: Tips for Traveling with Kids
articles.excerpt: Make family trips smoother with these simple planning tips.
articles.body: Traveling with children can be fantastic – with a bit of planning. Choose accommodations close to activities, plan for breaks and don’t overbook your days. Destinations like Trysil with kids' ski areas or Rome with many parks and gelato stops can make the experience enjoyable for the whole family...
